name: react-dev
description: - Set up all the `tools in your laptop`   - `VS Code`   - `Chrome`   - `Extensions of Chrome` - Create a `new Git repo` - Build your `first Hello World` program using,   - Using `just HTML`   - Using `JS to manipulate the DOM`   - Using `React`     - `use CDN Links`     - `Create an Element`     - `Create nested React Elements`     - `Use root.render`
